description: The Boosted ETH Vault accepts ETH deposits, managed via Mellow smart contracts. Curated by Re7 Labs, the vault restakes wstETH on Symbiotic and employs advanced risk-management strategies to optimize rewards while maintaining security. Until Lido v3, ETH is staked on Lido v2. Upon Lido v3 launch, ETH staking will transition to DVT using Stakinâ€™s infrastructure.
name: Re7 LidoV3 x Stakin
